app_sentences.cn: 我们午餐吃了蔬菜沙拉。

app_sentences.en: Grapes are used to make wine.
He likes to surf in Hawaii.
Kangaroos live in Australia.
Riding is a popular sport in this area.
app_sentences.cn: 骑马在这个地区是一项流行的运动。

app_sentences.en: Don't be so lazy!
n. 乘坐,Can you ride a bike?
n. 打赌,I bet he will win.
You bet I'll be there!
The thing is, I don't have enough money.
app_sentences.cn: 问题是，我没有足够的钱。

app_sentences.en: This is a general rule.
adj. 标准的,The work is not up to standard.
I have a feeling that something is wrong.
app_sentences.cn: 我有种感觉，好像有什么不对劲。

app_sentences.en: She had difficulty understanding the accent.
app_sentences.cn: 她理解那种口音有困难。

app_sentences.en: English is my favourite subject.
app_sentences.cn: 英语是我最喜欢的科目。

app_sentences.en: Add some sugar to the tea.
Have you seen him recently?
May I see the menu, please?
If we play well, we are in with a chance of winning.
app_sentences.cn: 如果我们打得好，我们就有机会赢。

app_sentences.en: What are you doing tonight?
The teacher read out the list of names.
The winner will receive a prize.
Compared with last year, our sales have increased.
app_sentences.cn: 与去年相比，我们的销售额增加了。

app_sentences.en: Even though it was raining, we went for a walk.
app_sentences.cn: 即使下着雨，我们还是去散步了。

app_sentences.en: n. 匆忙,Don't rush! We have plenty of time.
She is wearing a white blouse.
app_sentences.cn: 她穿着一件白色的女式衬衫。

app_sentences.en: She bought a new skirt.

data.meaning: phr. 保护某物免受某物侵害

app_sentences.en: This coat will protect you against the cold.
app_sentences.cn: 这件外套可以保护你免受寒冷。

app_sentences.en: She is a famous pop singer.
app_sentences.cn: 她是一位著名的流行歌手。

app_sentences.en: Congratulations on your success!
The headmaster gave a speech at the assembly.
app_sentences.cn: 校长在集会上发表了讲话。

app_sentences.en: adj. 现在的,He gave me a present for my birthday.
app_sentences.cn: 他送了我一份生日礼物。

app_sentences.en: My father works in a car factory.
app_sentences.cn: 我父亲在一家汽车厂工作。

app_sentences.en: Factories should not pollute the river.
We should recycle plastic bottles.
v. 浪费,It's a waste of time.
They defeated the enemy.
The farmers are harvesting the crops.
Hunting kills many wild animals.
app_sentences.cn: 狩猎杀死了许多野生动物。

app_sentences.en: The price of oil is rising.
adv. 更少地,We should use less water.
The situation seems hopeless.
This china vase is very valuable.
The teacher divided the class into two groups.
adj. 塑料的,Don't use too much plastic.
The government has a new environmental policy.
app_sentences.cn: 政府有一项新的环境政策。

app_sentences.en: We should reuse paper bags.
app_sentences.cn: 我们应该重复使用纸袋。

app_sentences.en: Please put the empty bottle in the recycling bin.
app_sentences.cn: 请把空瓶子放进回收箱。

app_sentences.en: Don't throw away the old newspapers.
Can you repeat what you said?
app_sentences.cn: 你能重复一下你说的话吗？

app_sentences.en: We need to reduce our expenses.
This cloth is made of cotton.
The truck can carry five tons of goods.
app_sentences.cn: 这辆卡车能载五吨货物。

app_sentences.en: There are tons of books in the library.
Tyres are made of rubber.
Recycling is good for the environment.
The city has undergone rapid development.
app_sentences.cn: 这座城市经历了迅速的发展。

app_sentences.en: v. 踏,Follow the steps in the instructions.
app_sentences.cn: 按照说明中的步骤操作。

app_sentences.en: His grandson is ten years old.
She loves her granddaughter very much.
